author: China Insights
description:
On the very day the CCP’s Fourth Plenum opened, bad news arrived for China’s economy: third-quarter GDP fell below 5%, the lowest this year. At the same time, overcapacity kept worsening and consumption remained sluggish, pushing deflationary pressure higher year by year. Price wars among firms are intensifying, and malignant “involution” has become the cancer of China’s economy. Unable to find a way out, the CCP authorities started painting grand visions to fool themselves: the CCP’s “15th Five-Year Plan” will focus on “technological innovation,” taking the United States as the hypothetical enemy as Beijing attempts to achieve “technological self-reliance” through “de-Americanization.” At this very moment, Trump put forward three themes for a meeting with Xi Jinping—rare earths, soybeans, and fentanyl—plainly on the table. Don’t miss the next drop—subscribe and hit the bell.

title: Fourth Plenum Shock: GDP Slumps, Rare-Earth Gambit Backfires—Did Xi Bet Wrong?

author: China Insights
description:
Beijing—on the very first day of the Fourth Plenum, someone got “axed”! The CCP just announced the removal of China’s representative to the World Trade Organization, Li Chenggang.
 This “wolf-warrior” diplomat—personally promoted by Xi Jinping in March and who only recently snarled that the U.S. would “face the fires of hell”—didn’t even last half a year before being kicked into the cold palace. The world is buzzing: have the wolf warriors gone off the rails? Or is Xi starting to “sacrifice the wolf warriors to seek conciliation”? Don’t miss the next drop—subscribe and hit the bell.

title: Xi’s Damage Control: Wolf-Warrior Envoy Ousted After U.S. Says “Out of Control”

author: China Insights
description:
On Halloween, Trump and Xi Will Meet Face-to-Face in Gyeongju, South Korea! The outside world is calling this APEC meeting a “Ghost Festival Summit”—eerie and deadly.
Right before the meeting, two ghost-like names surfaced in Beijing: former foreign minister Qin Gang “resurrected,” while star Phoenix TV host Fu Xiaotian vanished without a trace. Is this diplomatic thaw—or a political summoning? Don’t miss the next drop—subscribe and enable the bell.

title: Halloween Summit Showdown: Trump vs. Xi as Qin Gang Reappears and Fu Xiaotian Vanishes

author: China Insights
description:
The Fourth Plenum Opens in Eerie Silence—No Footage, No Applause, State Media Mute. At the Same Time, Nine Generals Are Expelled; Only Four Remain on the CMC. Explosive Rumors: Will Xi Jinping Resign as CMC Chairman? Talk Grows That Zhang Youxia Will Take Over. Xinhua’s Midnight Essay Praises the “Core” 20+ Times—Commentators Say It’s Not Laudation but Interment.
